snippet.title: Candy and Clyde (2007) - Miniclip.com game
snippet.description:
Candy & Clyde can now be played here: https://bit.ly/4gUAozF

A collection of 15 minigames à la WarioWare, where the player can solve each game using Candy, a nice girl that helps others, or Clyde, a naughty boy with a mean attitude. Each game can change dramatically depending on which character you pick.

Players get to choose Candy or Clyde at the start of each microgame with the rules changing slightly depending on the chosen character. The player will get 1 to 5 stars depending on how quickly the task is done and if too much time is taken the player will lose a life. Once the 15 games are done they are repeated in the same order at a harder difficulty level (more items, greater distance, etc.) and continue to get more difficult until all lives are lost.

10 of the 15 microgames:

Match Maker
● Candy: Memory game matching the photos by turning them over.
● Clyde: Use a match to burn the photos.

Comb Me
● Candy: Use a comb to fix up a persons hair.
● Clyde: Use a blow-dryer to mess up a person’s hair.

Tidy Neighbourhood
● Candy: Clean up trash.
● Clyde: Take the trash out of the bin.

Counting Sheep
● Candy: Make the sheep jump the fence.
● Clyde: Make the sheep hit the fence.

Cockroach
● Candy: Scare the boogie off by using bugs to make it step on pins.
● Clyde: Step on the bugs.

Venus Fly Trap
● Candy: Feed the Venus Fly Trap bugs.
● Clyde: Feed the Venus Fly Trap pins and bolts.

Bird’s Nest
● Candy: Save the bird by flying it up the tree.
● Clyde: Cut down the tree with birds in it.

Shopping List
● Candy: Get the items on the shopping list.
● Clyde: Get the items not on the shopping list.

Rainy Day
● Candy: Hover an umbrella over the man to stop him getting wet.
● Clyde: Hover a rain cloud over the man to get him wet.

Fish Bowls
● Candy: Feed the fish.
● Clyde: Feed the fish to the other fish.

Candy and Clyde was published in 2007 by Miniclip.com
